channel.title: The Hon. Dan Benishek
channel.description: The Hon. Dan Benishek U.S. Representative - Michigan 1st District (Remarks as Prepared for Delivery)

item.title: My story is like many from Northern Michigan. I grew up in a little town called Iron River. My family didn't have much when I was growing up and we lost my dad when I was young.
item.author: The Hon. Dan Benishek

item.title: But I worked hard, saved money, and was able to become a doctor and raise my family in Northern Michigan.
item.author: The Hon. Dan Benishek

item.title: Along the way, it never occurred to me to get into politics, let alone run for Congress. But I did, two years ago.
item.author: The Hon. Dan Benishek

item.title: Because, like many of you, I was disgusted by what was going on in Washington. They are spending away our children's and grandchildren's futures.
item.author: The Hon. Dan Benishek

item.title: Today, the American Dream is being threatened.
item.author: The Hon. Dan Benishek

item.title: I know our nation is facing enormous challenges. Unemployment is far too high. We have a nearly $16 trillion debt. It's hard for Michigan families to make ends meet.
item.author: The Hon. Dan Benishek

item.title: But I believe we can fix these problems by staying true to what has always made this country great: individual liberty, free enterprise, and limited government.
item.author: The Hon. Dan Benishek

item.title: People from Northern Michigan are tough. We don't give up when times are hard. Like you, we will keep working to protect the American Dream, and to ensure our best days are yet to come.
item.author: The Hon. Dan Benishek

item.title: So we need you to keep the American Dream alive and deliver this election for America. Thank you and may God bless you all.
item.author: The Hon. Dan Benishek
